sentences.en: According to the zodiac she is compatible with Aries and Virgo.
sentences.cn: 根据星座来看,她跟白羊座和处女座的人比较合得来.

sentences.en: First I recognized Virgo boys were described as practical.
sentences.cn: 首先处女座男生被说成实际,这可以认同.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, romantic Venus narrows our focus as she steps into discriminating Virgo.
sentences.cn: 同时, 浪漫的金星缩小了我们的焦点,因为它在有识别力的处女座.

sentences.en: Ruled by shape - shifting Mercury, Virgo works hard to stability.
sentences.cn: 在流动的水星控制下, 处女座需要努力才能获得稳定.

sentences.en: That month also an eclipse in Virgo on February 20.
sentences.cn: 那个月里同样有在处女座的月食,在2月20日.

sentences.en: The good energy ( Venus in Virgo ) comes as of the 20 th.
sentences.cn: 20号金星在 处女 座,带来一股友善的星相能量.

sentences.en: The virginity associated with Virgo actually relates to discernment, to the choice.
sentences.cn: 由处女去联想处女座的特质,也可以发现一些,如警惕、审慎 、 沈静以及羞涩.

sentences.en: VIRGO : Thoroughly washes the chocolates, then rations them to all involved.
sentences.cn: 狮子座喜欢首先占有所有的巧克力.

sentences.en: Virgo appreciative of practical gifts such as appliances and office supplies.
sentences.cn: 处女座喜欢实用的礼物,譬如器具、办公设备.

sentences.en: Virgo is your opposite sign, so in this placement, Saturn challenges you.
sentences.cn: 处女座是你正对的星座, 所以在这个位置, 土星不断挑战着你.

sentences.en: Virgo keeps getting up to re - tuck the sheets and fluff the pillows.
sentences.cn: 处女座:不停地起身整理床单和枕头是失眠的最大原因.

sentences.en: Virgo wears a neatly - pressed suit and tells everyone they're a bookkeeper.
sentences.cn: 处女座穿着熨帖的套装,逢人便说自己是簿记员.

sentences.en: Virgo's gifts do not matter quite so much as their impeccable wrapping.
sentences.cn: 处女座的礼物并不像像精美的包装一样华丽.

sentences.en: Well, for once your horoscope is clearer than most, Virgo.
sentences.cn: 恩, 这次你的星位是最清晰的时刻了, 童贞座.

sentences.en: You as a Virgo probably know what your basic Horoscope is.
sentences.cn: 人出生在这个标志往往知道其基本星座.

words.tran_cn: 十六、七世纪的小型有键乐器

phrases.tran_cn: 室女座星系团；处女座星系团

trans.tran_en: Virgo is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a young woman. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of August and the 22nd of September come under this sign.
